p: 6-amino-2-chloroquinoline-3-carbaldehyde (0.002 mol) and urea were dissolved in 15 mL of glacial acetic acid and refluxed for 15 h. On completion (inferred through TLC), the mixture was poured onto crushed ice and neutralized with diluted NaOH. The solid product, 7-aminopyrimido (4, 5-b) quinoline-2(1 H)one (3f), was separated. m.p. 247 °C. Yield: 78%. Color: brownish-yellow.
